midas/drivers/kernel/khyt1331/esonetest.c

00001 #include <stdio.h>
00002 #include "esone.h"
00003 
00004 void isr(void)
00005 {
00006    int ext, q;
00007    unsigned short d;
00008 
00009    /* toggle output so one can measure interrupt response time */
00010    cdreg(&ext, 0, 0, 1, 0);
00011    d = 0xFF;
00012    cssa(16, ext, &d, &q);
00013    d = 0;
00014    cssa(16, ext, &d, &q);
00015 
00016    /* clear lam in unit and controller */
00017    cdlam(&ext, 0, 0, 1, 0, NULL);
00018    cclc(ext);
00019 
00020    /* re-enable crate demand */
00021    ccrgl(ext);
00022 
00023    printf("ISR\n");
00024 }
00025 
00026 main()
00027 {
00028    int ext, q;
00029    unsigned long d;
00030    unsigned short sd;
00031 
00032    /* initialize CAMAC */
00033    if (!fccinit())
00034       return;
00035 
00036    /* crate zero and remove inhibit */
00037    cdreg(&ext, 0, 0, 0, 0);
00038    cccz(ext);
00039    ccci(ext, 0);
00040 
00041    /* write data and read back */
00042    cdreg(&ext, 0, 0, 1, 0);
00043    d = 0x123456;
00044    cfsa(16, ext, &d, &q);
00045    d = 0;
00046    cfsa(0, ext, &d, &q);
00047    printf("Read back %X, should be 123456\n", d);
00048 
00049    /* enable and clear LAM in unit */
00050    cdreg(&ext, 0, 0, 1, 0);
00051    cssa(26, ext, &sd, &q);
00052    cdlam(&ext, 0, 0, 1, 0, NULL);
00053    cclc(ext);
00054 
00055    /* register service routine */
00056    cclnk(ext, isr);
00057 
00058    /* enable crate demand */
00059    cccd(ext, 1);
00060 
00061    /* go into endless loop */
00062    while (1);
00063 }
